original: 三國時著名刺客。鮮卑大人軻比能崛起後，漸有不臣之心，數度寇邊，侵害并州，幽州刺史王雄遂派刺客韓龍刺殺軻比能。韓龍功成後，再無下文。
text: Famous assassin in the Three Kingdoms period. After the rise of Lord Xianbei Ke Bi Neng, he gradually became unwilling to take sides and attacked Bingzhou. The Assassin Wang Xiong sent the assassin Han Long to assassinate Ke Bineng. After Han Long succeeded, there was nothing to follow.
